  proposition: Jinhao Duan et al. conducted a study on membership inference attacks on diffusion models in the International Conference on Machine Learning.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Jinhao Duan|RESEARCHER_AT|International Conference on Machine Learning

  proposition: Nicolas Carlini et al. investigated extracting training data from diffusion models at the 32nd USENIX Security Symposium.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Nicolas Carlini|RESEARCHER_AT|32nd USENIX Security Symposium
    
    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-attribute relationships:
    Tao Wang|PUBLISHED|survey

  proposition: Gong Zhang et al. developed a method for forgetting information in text-to-image diffusion models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gong Zhang|DEVELOPED|method
    Gong Zhang|FOCUS|forgetting information
    Gong Zhang|DOMAIN|text-to-image diffusion models

  proposition: Qipan Xu completed a master's thesis on PAC Privacy Preserving Diffusion Models at Rutgers University.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Qipan Xu|AFFILIATED_WITH|Rutgers University
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Qipan Xu|COMPLETED|master's thesis
    Qipan Xu|RESEARCH_TOPIC|PAC Privacy Preserving Diffusion Models

  proposition: Fahad Shamshad et al. proposed CLIP2Protect, a method for protecting facial privacy using text-guided makeup via adversarial latent search.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Fahad Shamshad|PROPOSED|CLIP2Protect
    CLIP2Protect|PURPOSE|protecting facial privacy
    CLIP2Protect|TECHNIQUE|text-guided makeup
    CLIP2Protect|METHOD|adversarial latent search

  proposition: Håkon Hukkelås et al. created DeepPrivacy, a generative adversarial network for face anonymization.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Håkon Hukkelås|CREATED|DeepPrivacy
    DeepPrivacy|TYPE|generative adversarial network
    DeepPrivacy|PURPOSE|face anonymization

  proposition: Xiao He et al. developed Diff-Privacy, a diffusion-based face privacy protection technique.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xiao He|DEVELOPED|Diff-Privacy
    Diff-Privacy|TYPE|diffusion-based technique
    Diff-Privacy|PURPOSE|face privacy protection

  proposition: Jiang Liu et al. introduced DiffProtect for generating adversarial examples to protect facial privacy.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiang Liu|INTRODUCED|DiffProtect
    DiffProtect|PURPOSE|protect facial privacy
    DiffProtect|METHOD|generating adversarial examples

  proposition: Claudio Novelli et al. examined generative AI in EU law, covering liability, privacy, intellectual property, and cybersecurity.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Claudio Novelli|EXAMINED|generative AI in EU law
    Claudio Novelli|RESEARCH_AREAS|liability, privacy, intellectual property, cybersecurity

  proposition: Jinyuan Jia et al. identified 10 security and privacy problems in large foundation models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jinyuan Jia|IDENTIFIED|security and privacy problems
    Jinyuan Jia|FOCUS|large foundation models
    Jinyuan Jia|NUMBER_OF_PROBLEMS|10

  proposition: Michael Duan et al. investigated membership inference attacks on large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Michael Duan|INVESTIGATED|membership inference attacks
    Michael Duan|FOCUS|large language models

  proposition: Jiawen Shi et al. explored security vulnerabilities of ChatGPT through backdoor attacks on InstructGPT.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiawen Shi|EXPLORED|security vulnerabilities
    Jiawen Shi|FOCUS|ChatGPT
    Jiawen Shi|METHOD|backdoor attacks on InstructGPT

  proposition: Several researchers studied large language models in various domains, including education, finance, and software engineering.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|STUDIED|large language models
    Researchers|DOMAINS|education, finance, software engineering
